      • getFactor_X_Y

        public java.awt.Point getFactor_X_Y(boolean target_is_left,
                                    boolean target_is_up)
        determines, whether an inversion of values for certain computations is needed for x/y direction.
        Parameters:
        target_is_left - whether (ie.) the target of an Arrow is positioned more left than its source.
        target_is_up - whether (ie.) the target of an Arrow is positionedhigher than its source.
        Returns:
        the x/y factors encoded as Point.
